## go-mdatp gendoc

Generate markdown documentation for the go-mdatp CLI.

### Synopsis

Generate markdown documentation for the go-mdatp CLI.

```
go-mdatp gendoc [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --dir string   directory where to write the doc. (default "./docs")
  -h, --help         help for gendoc
```
